projectGridLines.title: 220 KV and 33 KV protection system & relay transmission
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project focuses on the design, implementation, and testing of protection systems

and relay transmissions for 220 KV and 33 KV electrical networks. It involves understanding the

operation of high-voltage protection equipment and ensuring system reliability and safety.

Skill sets: Knowledge of electrical/electronic engineering principles, familiarity with high-voltage

systems, understanding of relay operations,

Expected learning: Interns will gain hands-on experience with high-voltage protection systems,.

Specific courses required for project execution: Electrical/Electronics engineering concepts

projectGridLines.title: Turbo generator system and control
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project involves the study and implementation of control systems for turbo

generators, focusing on optimizing performance, efficiency, and stability of power generation. It

covers the integration of control strategies and the monitoring of generator parameters.

Skill sets: knowledge of power generation systems, proficiency in control systems engineering,.

Expected learning: Interns will learn about the operation and control of turbo generators, develop

expertise in control strategies for power systems, gain practical experience with simulation and

monitoring tools, and improve their understanding of efficiency and stability in power generation.

Specific courses required for project execution: Electrical/Electronics engineering concepts,

Control Systems

projectGridLines.title: Optimization of FAD compressor air consumption
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project focuses on analyzing and optimizing the air consumption of compressors

used in manufacturing industry.

Skill sets: understanding of compressor systems in industrial applications, proficiency in data

analysis and optimization tech

Expected learning: Interns will gain insights into the operation and optimization of compressors in

the ferroalloy industry, develop skills in energy efficiency analysis, learn about advanced optimization

methods, and enhance their ability to use simulation and data analysis tools.

Specific courses required for project execution: Mechanical/Industrial Engineering

projectGridLines.title: PCM mould life enhancement
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project involves investigating and implementing methods to extend the life of

moulds used in Pig Casting Machines (PCM). The focus is on understanding wear mechanisms,

material properties, and process parameters to improve mould longevity and reduce operational

costs.

Skill sets: Industrial/Mechanical design knowledge, understanding of casting processes,

Expected learning: Industrial/Mechanical design exposure and Interns will gain expertise in the

wear mechanisms affecting PCM moulds, develop process optimization, and enhance their

understanding of ways to improve mould life and reduce downtime.

Specific courses required for project execution: Mechanical/Industrial Engineering
